Description:
After fail to get the metadate of result set, the web service dataset is blocked in table mapping selection[0707]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070418-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a WS Data source
   http://api.google.com/GoogleSearch.wsdl
2, Select the second operation and input the correct key and value
3, Select the table mapping and column mapping
4, Click OK and Preview the result
5, Create another same dataset
6, Do the same steps as step1 to step4

Expected result:
After step4 the preview is successful and get the correct result set
After step6, the preview is successful

Actual result:
In step4, fail to get the result set, and error occurs
After step6, the dataset is blocking at the table mapping selection page and the exception occurs

Error log:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
at org.eclipse.datatools.enablement.oda.xml.util.RelationInformation.initialize(RelationInformation.java:74)
at org.eclipse.datatools.enablement.oda.xml.util.RelationInformation.<init>(RelationInformation.java:49)
